snippet.title: Live FFA Cup: 4th A-League team upset, extra-time
snippet.content:
HEIDELBERG United have become the fourth state-level side to upset an A-League team in the FFA Cup after a 1-0 victory in the Round of 32. Western Sydney Wanderers were defeated by Adelaide City in 2014, Central Coast Mariners went down to Green Gully in 2016, and Redlands United upset Adelaide United in 2016. You can Western Sydney and Wellington Phoenix in extra time, or follow the action in the live blog at the bottom. HEIDELBERG UNITED 1 - 0 PERTH GLORY Match Centre:
PENINSULA POWER 0 - 2 MELBOURNE CITY Match Centre: OLYMPIA FC WARRIORS 0 - 5 APIA LEICHHARDT TIGERS Match Centre: WESTERN SYDNEY WANDERERS FC V WELLINGTON PHOENIX
Match Centre:
Follow all the action in our live blog below!
Originally published as

sindex.name: OLYMPIA FC WARRIORS 0 - 5 APIA LEICHHARDT TIGERS
WESTERN SYDNEY WANDERERS FC V WELLINGTON PHOENIX
